affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 信任;  信念, 即: trust, faith
表名词, 性质; 状态
表示"现在"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 机密的；表示信任的；获信任的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指单纯从主观上的相信，不着重这种相信是否有根据。
多指根据长期交往或实践，对某人某事有了认识和了解后产生的信心和相信，侧重其坚定性。
语气较强，强调完全相信；有时也能仅凭感觉产生的相信。
强调相信、信任的完全可靠。
指对某人某事有充分信心，断定不会使人失望，因而给予信任。
语气最弱，着重以声誉为信任的基础。

word_group.brief_definition: 对自己的意志力有信心
向某人透露秘密；把某人当作知己
信任；对...的信任；对...有信心
公众的信心；公众信任；公共信任

bilingual.source: I was full of confidence - until the Peking Opera came to town!
bilingual.target: 我充满了信心——直到京剧团来到镇上！

bilingual.source: We have absolute confidence in Sarah's abilities, and we believe she will solve the problem.
bilingual.target: 我们对莎拉的能力有绝对的信心，并且相信她会解决这个问题。

bilingual.source: Having seen quite a few productions of Hamlet and read the play many times, I was full of confidence.
bilingual.target: 看过不少《哈姆雷特》的演出并多次阅读这部戏剧，我充满了信心。
他的话夺走了我的信心。

bilingual.source: His confidence grows with each passing day.

bilingual.target: 他的信心在失败后沦陷了。
她对自己的能力缺乏信心。
她的信心在失败后收缩了。

bilingual.source: She is trying hard to get back her confidence.

yingyinNormal.en: You made me think I was this great actor. You filled me up with confidence that I was really special.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你让我认为自己是个很牛的演员，你让我充满信心，认为自己独一无二。

yingyinNormal.en: So? So why is it no longer a specialty? Did the chef lose confidence in the dish or himself? And look over here. Shrimp in mobster sauce. What is mobster sauce?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以呢？所以它为什么不是招牌菜了呢？这里的厨师是对这道菜没了信心，还是对他自己没了信心啊？再看这里，强盗酱沾鲜虾，强盗酱是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: As 2014 comes to an end, we can enter the New Year with new confidence that America is making significant strides where it counts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 2014年马上就要结束了，我们怀着信心走进新的一年，美国在体现她价值的地方，正发生着显著的变化。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Leonard, do you think your mom would be available? Yeah, you don't want to do that. Talking to my mom to get more confidence is like talking to a lion to get more alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你觉得你母亲会有空吗？你不会想找她谈的。想跟我妈聊天来得到信心就跟去找阎王聊天来得到生存感一样。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was going through all my insecurities And uncertainty and lack of confidence, I was losing focus on god. I was focusing on all these other things, Like my job and what other people thought of me And what the reporters were writing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我感到缺乏安全感，失去信心，那是因为我分散了对神的专注，我把注意力放到别的事情上了，比如我的工作和别人的想法以及各种对我的报道

yingyinNormal.en: My problem is, I don't project confidence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的问题在于，我没有展现出自信。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I need to tell you something in confidence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我需要告诉你一些比较秘密的事。

yingyinNormal.en: I move for a vote of no confidence in the president. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我提出对现任主席不信任的提案。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: I want it understood, Cornelius, that Hagrid has my full confidence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望你能够明白，夫子。我对海格绝对的信任。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: She should be filling him with confidence and fish like I do to Manny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她应该用自信和鱼来填饱它的肚子，就像我对曼尼做的那样。

yingyinNormal.en: What if I get caught? Fear of failure! Lack of confidence! Kind of a wuss!
yingyinNormal.zh: 万一被抓到怎么办？害怕失败！缺乏自信！有点怂逼！

yingyinNormal.en: Well, this is great. Really good confidence booster for tomorrow. Thanks, cage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是好极了，战前动员做的不错，谢谢，凯奇。

yingyinNormal.en: Muhammed Kalabi, 34, Syrian national. Local assets confirm his ID with high confidence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 穆罕默德·卡拉比，34岁，叙利亚公民，当地线人确认，他的身份可信度很高。

yingyinNormal.en: I know I can always count on you for a draught of self-confidence whenever I start to doubt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道我怀疑自己的时候，你肯定会为我鼓劲。

yingyinNormal.en: Great. Hey, John. Thank you for your vote of confidence. And welcome to the Investor's Center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好了，谢谢你的信任票，欢迎来到投资者中心。

yingyinNormal.en: They protect us from future frustration, they give us trust and confidence and all kinds of other things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将来遭遇挫折，他们会保护我们，给我们以信任和自信和所有的所有。

yingyinNormal.en: A morally ambiguous confidence man who smokes, has lung cancer and is tormented by the spirits of the undead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个走在正邪之间，因抽烟患有肺癌被不死的灵魂折磨着的男人的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: I said that to you in confidence. This is supposed to be our family fun day. What's so important on your phone?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我私下跟你说的好吗？这应该是我们的家庭欢乐游。你手机上有什么事那么重要？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be. This is where we demonstrate strength, confidence, and trust in her upbringing that will get her to the right decision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用。我们在养育她时要展现出坚定，自信，和信任，好让她能做出对的决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Either you are in each other's confidence and you have secret affairs to discuss, or you are conscious that your figures appear to the greatest advantage by walking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两是心腹之交，肯定有些私事要聊聊；否则就是你们自以为散起步来体态显得特别好看，所以要散散步。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the state of feeling certain about the truth of something

examination_example.sentence: With characteristic <highlight>confidence</highlight>, Dickens successfully insisted that Seymour's pictures illustrate his own story instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凭借特有的自信，狄更斯成功地坚持让西蒙的版画来为他自己的故事作插图。

examination_example.sentence: "Readers must have <highlight>confidence</highlight> in the conclusions published in our journal," writes McNutt in an editorial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “读者必须对发表在我们杂志上的结论有信心，”McNutt在一篇社论中写道。

examination_example.sentence: It gave me the validation and <highlight>confidence</highlight> that I'd lost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它给了我曾经丢失的肯定和信心。

sense_info_list.en: the telling of private matters or secrets with mutual trust

word_usage.usage: confidence作名词，在表示“信赖……”时，后常接介词in，如：have confidence in their manager

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对自己的意志力有信心

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the state of feeling certain about the truth of something

examination_example.sentence: Having someone who has <highlight>confidence</highlight> in them.
Conversely, she says, opting for clothes that fit well and align with your sense of style can improve your <highlight>confidence</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，她说，选择合身且符合你风格的衣服可以增强你的自信。

examination_example.sentence: We can now say with some <highlight>confidence</highlight> that pasta doesn't have an adverse effect when consumed as part of a healthy dietary pattern.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在可以自信地说，作为健康饮食模式的一部分，食用意大利面不会产生不利影响。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 指单纯从主观上的相信, 不着重这种相信是否有根据。
普通用词, 常表示一种缓和、不太肯定的口气。
侧重忠诚可靠与可信赖。
指对某人某事有充分信心, 断定不会使人失望, 因而给予信任。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 她需要明白自信的重要性。
